GSD.description:
9p: trans_fd/p9_conn_cancel: drop client lock earlier

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.300 by commit e3031280fe4eaf61a09e60823331f81f321be8e1. For more details please see the references link.
